data.name: SQL
data.xml_template:
<route  id="{{source}}">
    <from uri="direct:{{source}}"/>
    {{applyUnmarshal input_format input_format_options}}
    <setBody>
        <groovy>
<![CDATA[
import java.sql.*; 
import groovy.sql.Sql;
import java.sql.Driver;
import groovy.json.JsonSlurper;
import groovy.json.JsonOutput;

def driver = Class.forName("{{safe driver}}").newInstance() as Driver

java.util.Properties info = new java.util.Properties();
info.put("user", "{{safe user}}");
info.put("password", "{{safe password}}");

def connection = driver.connect("{{safe url}}", info);

def sql = Sql.newInstance(connection)

def result;

jsonBody = JsonOutput.toJson(request.getBody())
def parserJson = new JsonSlurper()
def body = parserJson.parseText(jsonBody)

def queryParams = [:]
def counterParams = 0;
for (paramvalue in {{groovyList query_params}}) {
    def item = [:]
    if (paramvalue.scope == "BODY") {
        queryParams[paramvalue.code] = body[paramvalue.value];
    } else if (paramvalue.scope == "HEADER") {
        queryParams[paramvalue.code] = request.getHeaders().get(paramvalue.value);
    } else {
        queryParams[paramvalue.code] = paramvalue.value;
    }
}

if ({{type}} == 1) {
    result = [:];
    def counter = 0;
    sql.eachRow("{{safe query}}", queryParams){ row ->
        def item = [:]
        (1..row.getMetaData().columnCount).each {
            item["${row.getMetaData().getColumnName( it )}"] = row[ it - 1 ];
        }
        result[counter++] = item;
    }
} else { 
    sql.connection.autoCommit = false
    try {
        if ({{type}} == 2) {
            result = sql.executeInsert("{{safe query}}", queryParams);
        }
        if ({{type}} == 3) {
            result = sql.executeUpdate("{{safe query}}", queryParams);
        }
        if ({{type}} == 4) {
            result = sql.execute("{{safe query}}", queryParams);
        }
        sql.commit()
    } catch(Exception ex) {
        sql.rollback()
    }
}

sql.close()

//return new com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.ObjectMapper().writeValueAsString(result);
 return result;
]]>
        
        
        
        
        </groovy>
    </setBody>
    {{applyMarshal output_format output_format_options}}
    {{generateDestination target}}
</route>
